data.title: Bobenko Viktor Fedorovich
data.text:
Bobenko Viktor Fedorovich, born 06 May, 1944 in the settlement of Novobureysky, Bureysky District, Amur Oblast, Soviet Union (since 1992 – Russia). Graduated from Khabarovsk Polytechnic Institute of (KPI) (23 March, 2005 KPI has been rearranged to the Pacific National University), Faculty of Construction and Road Machines (at the present time – Department of Transport and Technological Systems in Construction and Mining, School of Automotive and Power Engineering), with a specialty in Construction and Road Machines, qualification Mechanical Engineer, in the city of Khabarovsk, Khabarovsk Krai, Soviet Union (1974). Associate Professor for the Department of Forestry and Forest Exploitation, Faculty of Nature Management, Far East State Agricultural University, in the city of Blagoveshchensk, Amur Oblast, Russia (2006-present). Scientific interests in forestry. Author and co-author of more than 30 scientific publications.

E-mail: victor_bobenko@mail.ru
